properties.SQL Query:
select
    a.id as auditorium_id,
    if(a.aud_num = a.description, a.aud_num, concat_ws(' ', a.aud_num, a.description)) as auditorium_name,
    a.aud_num as auditorium_name_kz,
    a.aud_num as auditorium_name_en,
    a.campus_id as campus_id,
    CAST(null AS SIGNED) as epvo_building_id,
    a.auditorium_type_id as auditorium_type_id,
    CAST(null AS SIGNED) as epvo_auditory_type_id,
    a.size as capacity,
    a.area as area
from auditoriums a
left join auditorium_type at on a.auditorium_type_id = at.id
where
    a.deleted = 0
    and (at.system_type is null or at.system_type != 1)
;
